title: Risen Form
name: Nyximera - Risen Form
printed_effect:
You can Expend {solar} in order to target and destroy a
face-down Rune. During your opponent's End Phase you must
either send this Nyximera to the Underworld or
Special Ascend it to Nyximera-Fallen Form
from your hand, deck, or Underworld.
effect: You can Expend {solar} in order to target and destroy a face-down Rune. During your End Phase you must either send this Nyximera to the Underworld or Special Ascend it to Nyximera-Fallen Form from your hand, deck, or Underworld.
